name: RogueLich
description:
An early build of a student produced traditional roguelike. 

Features:

  • Turn based combat
  • Randomly generated dungeons and items
  • Inventory system and skill tree

There are currently lots of bugs, and while I probably know about most of them, feel free to let me know of any you find.

The current controls are as follows:

  • Move - "WASD"
  • Attack - "Q" or "Move into an enemy"
  • Pick Up - "E"
  • Open/Close Inventory - "Tab"
  • Use skill - "1-5" (You will get a skill point at level 3, and can access the skill tree from the inventory screen)
  • Use Item - "6-9" (Drag consumables(Potions, scrolls, thrown weapons, food) from your inventory to the hotbar)
  • Use Stairs - "Backspace"

This project is not currently being updated.
